quest.name: Traitor in the Midst
journal: Minfilia would have you assist Alphinaud in his new station as commander of the Crystal Braves.

Conscious of the many practical difficulties facing the newly formed Crystal Braves, Minfilia asks that you place yourself at Alphinaud's disposal. Find the boy commander within the Rising Stones, and offer him your aid.
Grateful for your offer of aid, Alphinaud bids you speak with Captain Ilberd, his second-in-command, to be briefed on the sensitive matter in which he requires your assistance.

Ilberd reveals that a Garlean spy known as the Ivy has infiltrated one of the Grand Companies. A suspect was identified among the Immortal Flames, but the man proved to be but one of many in the agent's employ. Accompany Ilberd to his meeting with Raubahn at the Hall of Flames, and remain on hand in the event that the Ivy chooses to make a move.

You learn that Raubahn and Ilberd have been friends and rivals since before the fall of Ala Mhigo. Under the guise of a long-awaited reunion, the two men discuss the matter of the Garlean spy. At the meeting's conclusion, it is agreed that both parties will continue their inquiries.
objectives: Speak with Raubahn at the Hall of Flames.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: <sigh> Try as I might, I cannot shake a creeping sense of dark foreboding... But it avails us naught to fret about the unknown. We must concentrate instead on the problems of the present.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The primals have been relatively quiet of late, and the beast tribes who summon them are under constant surveillance by the Grand Companies.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Should any suspicious activity be afoot, you may be certain that we will hear of it.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: And until such time as a permanent solution to the primal problem has been found, we can do little but wait and observe.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: As for the Ascians, Urianger is wholly dedicated to finding the means by which we may defeat the dark beings. Let us pray for good tidings on that front.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: ...But all of this you knew already. Let us speak then of more current matters─in particular, the state of the Crystal Braves.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Alphinaud did well to found the organization, but ensuring its smooth operation is another matter entirely.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Though I doubt not that he is doing his best, I felt that a helping hand or two would not go astray.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: To this end, I offered to send one of the Archons to assist him, but he declined. You know how he can be─independent to a fault, and singularly loath to accept help...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: ...Save, of course, when that help comes from you. Alphinaud has entrusted countless matters of import to your care in the past, and I believe he would not hesitate to do so again...were you to offer.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: I should be most grateful if you would go to him, and support him in whatever manner you are able.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Alphinaud refused the Archons' help, but I believe that he would welcome yours. I should be most grateful if you would place yourself at his disposal.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: What is it, Forename? And do be concise. I am rather busy.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Hm? You would lend a hand, you say? I see. Well...now that you mention it, there is a matter that wants for attention.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Given its sensitive nature, I was hesitant to entrust it to my Braves, but the demands upon my time are such that I had little choice.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Which is not to say that my men want for labor. Though we are but newly formed, there is already a great demand for our services, and we are hard-pressed to answer all petitions. But I digress...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The fact is, I would sooner attend to this particular matter myself, but my presence is required elsewhere.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: That being the case, I have entrusted its resolution to my second-in-command, Captain Ilberd.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Tell him that I sent you, and he will furnish you with the particulars. My thanks in advance, Forename.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have given Captain Ilberd charge of the matter.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Tell him that I sent you, and he will furnish you with the particulars. My thanks in advance, Forename.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: Dispatch the 1st Unit to Ul'dah. The 2nd and 4th are to stand by for further orders.

dialogue.name: ROAILLE
dialogue.text: Ever a pleasure, my friend. Nary a day passes by that I do not hear of your valorous exploits.

dialogue.name: ILBERD
dialogue.text: We must begin by apprising General Raubahn of our findings. Pray meet me at the Hall of Flames, and remain on hand to see that things go smoothly.
